translation.en: Jake, finally.
Oh! Eileen, hello! I thought you were my brother.
translation.ko: 아일린, 안녕하세요? 전 오빠가 온 줄 알았네요

translation.en: Is Jake making you do all the work again?
translation.ko: 제이크가 또 케리에게 이 일을 다 시키나요?

translation.en: Oh, no. Jake has been banned from the kitchen since junior high
translation.ko: 아니요, 제이크는 중학교 때부터 주방 출입 금지당했어요

translation.en: when he almost burned it down making gumdrops.
translation.ko: 젤리 만들다가 주방을 다 태울 뻔했거든요

translation.en: He enjoys the operational side. You can't overboil numbers.
translation.ko: 오빠는 운영 쪽을 좋아해요 숫자는 태울 일이 없으니까요

translation.en: No, you can't.
I'll have my usual.
Okay, three mint meltaways.
translation.ko: 네, 민트 초코 쿠키 세 개요

translation.en: Oh! And here is a salted coconut caramel buttercream for you to try.
translation.ko: 짭짤한 코코넛 캐러멜 버터크림 쿠키도 한번 드셔 보세요

translation.en: -Ooh! You are a dear. -You're gonna like that.
Oh! I also need to pre-order two boxes of toffee for my grandson.
translation.ko: 그리고 예약도 할게요 손자에게 줄 토피 사탕 두 박스요

translation.en: Okay.
Two boxes, you got it.
-[register chimes] -When does Megan get home?
I was hoping for Winterfest,
but she's studying in Luxembourg so probably not till summer.
translation.ko: 룩셈부르크에서 공부하고 있어서 여름은 돼야 올 것 같아요

translation.en: What a smart world traveler you've raised.
She didn't get it from me. I am such a homebody.
See you next week.
-Don't forget your chocolate. -Ooh! Thanks.
translation.ko: - 다음 주에 봐요 - 초콜릿 챙기셔야죠 고마워요

translation.en: -You're late. -Sorry, ma'am.
-Come on! -Sorry.
I know, I'm late getting this to you, but I was talking to Ophelia--
translation.ko: 미안, 배달이 늦었지 - 오필리아랑 얘기하느라… - 괜찮아, 왔으니 다행이야

translation.en: It's okay, I'm just glad you're here.
We have so much to do before Winterfest and I…
translation.ko: 윈터페스트 전이라 오늘 밤에 할 일이 너무 많거든

translation.en: Jake, are you all right?
Oh, great.
-Yeah, but, um… -But what?
Hey, are you free for dinner tonight?
Should I be worried?
No, not really.
That's not reassuring.
How about 7:30?
Kerrie, Jake, hello, hello.
-Hi. -How is everything?
It is delicious as always. Thank you, Adam.
-You outdid yourself with the crab cakes. -I'm glad you like it.
translation.ko: - 게살 케이크는 계속 발전하네요 - 맛있게 드셨다니 다행입니다

translation.en: I still need to come by and place my candy order for Winterfest.
translation.ko: 저도 언제 한번 가서 윈터페스트 사탕 주문해야 하는데

translation.en: Is Alexandra working this week?
I believe she is. Great.
-Enjoy your meals. -Thank you.
So, not that I don't enjoy being treated to dinner by my big brother,
translation.ko: 오빠한테 식사 대접 받는 게 즐겁지 않은 건 아니지만

translation.en: but can you please tell me what's going on right now?
translation.ko: 이제 슬슬 무슨 일인지 말해 줄래?

translation.en: Okay.
So…
Ophelia got offered her dream job teaching English literature in London.
translation.ko: 오필리아가 꿈에 그리던 직장에 자리가 나서 가게 됐어 런던에서 영문학을 가르칠 거야 지금 아주 신났어

translation.en: She's beyond ecstatic.
translation.ko: 런던에서 영문학을 가르칠 거야 지금 아주 신났어

translation.en: I couldn't be happier for her.
Jake, that's fantastic!
You are such a supportive husband.
It's too bad Ophelia couldn't be with us tonight to celebrate.
translation.ko: 오늘 오필리아도 같이 와서 축하했다면 좋았을 텐데

translation.en: And how perfect that London is less than a 30-minute drive from here.
translation.ko: 게다가 런던이라니 딱 좋잖아 여기서 차로 30분이면 가니까

translation.en: Not London, Ohio.
London, England. Silchester University.
She accepted a job in England?
One of their professors left unexpectedly so Ophelia flew out early this morning.
translation.ko: 거기 교수 한 명이 갑자기 나갔대 그래서 오필리아는 오늘 아침 일찍 갔어

translation.en: She wanted to tell you herself, but there wasn't time.
translation.ko: 너한테 말하고 싶어 했지만 시간이 없었지

translation.en: I can't… What about the store?
I can't run it alone.
Especially with Winterfest coming up.
There aren't enough hours in the day for me to do everything myself.
translation.ko: 나 혼자 다 하려면 온종일 일해도 부족할 거야

translation.en: That's what I wanted to talk to you about.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 그 얘기를 하고 싶었어

translation.en: I've been thinking about long-term solutions,
and the best one might be for me to sell my half of the business.
translation.ko: 내가 가진 지분 절반을 파는 게 좋을 것 같아

translation.en: I'm sorry, I know how you feel about change,
translation.ko: 미안해, 네가 변화를 어떻게 생각하는지는 알아

translation.en: and this is a lot of news all at once.
translation.ko: 많은 소식을 한 번에 들어서 정신도 없겠지만

translation.en: But, in a major stroke of luck for both of us,
translation.ko: 많은 소식을 한 번에 들어서 정신도 없겠지만 우리에게 천운이 따르나 봐

translation.en: there's an interested buyer who we both already know.
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 아는 사람이 지분을 사겠다고 해

translation.en: -Who? -Brooks McLead.
Wait, what?
He's a financial genius and extremely successful entrepreneur.
It's a gift that he wants to buy into our family shop.
translation.ko: 우리 가족 가게의 지분을 사겠다니 정말 천운이야

translation.en: -No, not happening. -Why not?
Because I remember what he was like in high school, that's why not.
translation.ko: 그 사람이 고등학교 때 어땠는지 기억하거든, 그래서 안 돼

translation.en: Kerrie, that was a long time ago.
Look, I'm going to be in the UK for the next five years and…
translation.ko: 난 앞으로 5년이나 영국에 있을 거야 - 그리고… - 5년?

translation.en: Five years?
Gosh, Jake, I'm really gonna miss you.
You should come with us. We'd love to have you.
translation.ko: 그럼 우리랑 같이 가자 우린 얼마든지 환영이야

translation.en: I mean, you've lived your entire life in Bedford.
We could sell the shop.
Every memory I have of Mom and Dad and Nanny and Pop
translation.ko: 내가 엄마, 아빠 할머니, 할아버지와 쌓은 추억은

translation.en: center around the shop.
Mom and Nanny taught me how to pour the candy molds.
translation.ko: 엄마랑 할머니는 내게 사탕 만드는 법을 알려 주셨고

translation.en: You painted the sign outside with Pop.
translation.ko: 가게 간판은 오빠랑 아빠가 직접 칠했잖아

translation.en: It's our family's legacy, it's our history.
This is my home, Jake.
Listen, I know that Brooks wasn't your favorite person back then.
translation.ko: 네가 예전에 브룩스를 그다지 좋아하지 않은 건 알아

translation.en: That's an understatement.
But he's incredibly competent, smart, trustworthy.
translation.ko: 하지만 엄청나게 유능하고 똑똑하고 믿음직스러운 친구야

translation.en: And his businesses always double or triple their profits.
translation.ko: 그 친구가 손대는 사업은 전부 수익이 두 배, 세 배로 뛰지

translation.en: I want you to have a nice nest egg to retire on one day.
translation.ko: 난 네가 언젠가 은퇴할 때 든든한 밑천이 있었으면 해

translation.en: I can't believe I'm saying this, but…
translation.ko: 내가 이런 말을 하게 될 줄은 몰랐지만

translation.en: okay. You can sell your half of the store to Brooks McLead.
translation.ko: 좋아, 가게 지분의 절반을 브룩스 매클리드에게 팔도록 해

translation.en: You won't regret this.
How are you settling in? Eh, better than the last place.
translation.ko: - 잘 적응하고 계셔요? - 저번에 거기보다는 낫더라

translation.en: Why can't your next venture be in Hawaii or Florida?
translation.ko: 다음 사업은 하와이나 플로리다에서 하는 게 어떠니?

translation.en: Yeah? You can move us there?
Brooks, whatever happened to that job in Silicon Valley?
translation.ko: 브룩스, 실리콘밸리에서 제안한 자리는 어떻게 됐어?

translation.en: -Check. -Turned it down.
After everything that happened in New York, I thought…
translation.ko: 뉴욕에서 그런 일을 겪고 나니 그냥 좀…

translation.en: just wanted a quieter life.
The Bay Area retirement community,
they had ocean views
and they offered surfing excursions.
-Just no comparison. -Sorry, Dad.
Listen, you know you can always move in with me if you'd like.
translation.ko: 있잖아요 굳이 여기서 안 사시고 언제든 제 집으로 오셔도 돼요

translation.en: -You don't have to live here. -Oh!
translation.ko: 굳이 여기서 안 사시고 언제든 제 집으로 오셔도 돼요

translation.en: Does your house have luxurious amenities,
translation.ko: 네 집에 고급 편의 시설이 있니?

translation.en: decadent dining, daily activities,
translation.ko: 근사한 식당이랑 날마다 바뀌는 활동 프로그램은?

translation.en: an organized social events calendar?
translation.ko: 사교 행사 일정도 짜 주고 그래?

translation.en: That's a really good point. I should move in here instead.
translation.ko: 맞는 말씀이네요 저도 여기로 들어올까 봐요

translation.en: What, and cramp my style? I don't think so.
That's it, check.
You know, I'm just hoping that one day, you'll just settle down permanently.
translation.ko: 난 그냥 네가 언젠가는 정착하길 바랄 뿐이야

translation.en: I'm not gonna be around forever to take care of you.
translation.ko: 내가 평생 옆에서 널 돌봐 줄 수는 없잖니

translation.en: I tried it, Dad, didn't work.
Sierra wasn't the right one for you.
Could have let me know that earlier, would have saved me a lot of grief.
translation.ko: 좀 일찍 말씀해 주셨으면 슬퍼할 일도 없었을 텐데요

translation.en: You wouldn't have listened, you're too stubborn.
translation.ko: 말해도 네가 안 들었을걸? 고집이 보통이 아니잖니

translation.en: You always will try to learn it the hard way.
Thanks, Dad.
Checkmate.
-Rematch? -No, I gotta go.
translation.ko: - 한 판 더 할래? - 아니요, 가 봐야 해요

translation.en: I gotta sign papers with the lawyer and Jake.
Rain check?
Yeah.
I love you, Dad.
I love you too, son.
I can't believe Jake and Ophelia are moving to England.
translation.ko: 제이크와 오필리아가 영국으로 간다니 믿기지 않아

translation.en: I know. And the timing couldn't be worse, with Winterfest coming up.
translation.ko: 그러니까 게다가 윈터페스트 직전이라니 타이밍이 최악이지

translation.en: I haven't even told Megan. I don't want her to worry.
translation.ko: 메건에게는 아직 말도 못 했어 괜히 걱정할 것 같아서

translation.en: I just want her to enjoy her semester abroad.
translation.ko: 그냥 유학 생활 즐겁게 보내고 오길 바라거든

translation.en: You're such a good mom.
Thanks. And thank you for coming on board full time.
translation.ko: 고마워, 그리고 전일제로 일해 주는 것도 고마워

translation.en: We are going to be working around the clock to get all this done.
translation.ko: 이거 다 마치려면 온종일 일해야 할 것 같아

translation.en: [Alexandra] I am happy to help.
One of our biggest events and we already have more orders than last year.
translation.ko: 일 년 중 가장 큰 행사이고 작년보다 주문량도 늘었잖아

translation.en: And less than two weeks to fill them. And I will gladly pay you double overtime.
translation.ko: 그런데 시간이 2주도 안 남았지 시간 외 근로 수당은 두 배로 줄게

translation.en: That's very generous.
So, when does your new business partner start?
translation.ko: 근데 새로운 사업 파트너는 언제부터 합류해?

translation.en: Oh, they're signing the paperwork right now.
I'm so glad this worked out.
I'm really excited to be a part of it. Perfect timing too.
translation.ko: 나도 함께하게 돼서 기뻐 마침 시기도 딱 좋아

translation.en: You sure you're not going to miss the city?
No. I'm through with it there. Looking for a change of scenery now.
translation.ko: 응, 그 생활은 청산했어 - 분위기를 좀 바꾸고 싶어 - 그래

translation.en: Yeah.
Now this is taken care of, you wanna get a drink, celebrate?
translation.ko: 이제 일은 다 끝났으니 기념으로 밥 먹으러 갈까?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It's got to be quick. I need to get back for the movers.
translation.ko: 그래, 근데 빨리 끝내야 해 이삿짐센터가 오기로 했거든

translation.en: -Oh, you're coming tonight? -Yeah, of course.
translation.ko: - 참, 오늘 밤에 올 거지? - 응, 당연하지

translation.en: That reminds me, I still need to place my candy order.
translation.ko: 그러고 보니 사탕 주문을 아직 안 했네요

translation.en: For you or your customers?
For my customers, of course.
Unless I eat them all first.
-Which is what usually happens. -Can't say I blame you.
translation.ko: 보통은 그렇게 되거든요 그럴 만도 하죠

translation.en: [sighs] I'm surprised Brooks isn't here yet.
translation.ko: 브룩스가 아직 안 온 건 의외네

translation.en: You invited him tonight?
No, you can just forward any of my mail to my new address in Ohio.
translation.ko: 아니, 내 앞으로 온 우편물은 오하이오 새 주소로 전달해 줘

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I hope I made the right decision too.
translation.ko: 그래, 나도 이게 옳은 결정이길 바라

translation.en: Okay.
-Hey! -Brooks, I'm glad you made it.
Thanks for having me. I got you something.
I think I'm gonna appreciate this more than I know.
translation.ko: 이 선물은 예상보다 더 유용할 것 같네

translation.en: I heard they only drink the tea over there, matey.
Oh, hey, you remember my sister, Kerrie?
translation.ko: 참, 내 동생 케리 기억하지? 네 새로운 사업 파트너야

translation.en: Your new business partner.
-Hi. -[Brooks] Hi.
-Long time. -Long time.
translation.ko: 오랜만이네 오랜만이야 다시 만나서 반가워, 빈

translation.en: It's nice to see you again, Bean.
Can I talk to you outside?
-Yeah, sure. -Excuse us.
Yeah, see you soon.
I've changed my mind about the partnership.
translation.ko: 사업 파트너 못 할 것 같아

translation.en: All he did was walk in the door.
translation.ko: 쟨 그냥 문 열고 들어오기밖에 안 했는데

translation.en: He called me Bean!
Well, I mean, you did fail miserably at your attempt
to create a jalapeño hot sauce jellybean.
Oh, come on, you know that was my experimental candy phase!
translation.ko: 그때 난 다양한 사탕 제조법을 실험하고 있었다고!

translation.en: I know. I think I still have a hole in the roof of my mouth from it.
translation.ko: 그래, 난 그거 먹은 후로 아직도 입이 얼얼한데

translation.en: That man made my life miserable in high school.
translation.ko: 내가 고등학교 때 쟤 때문에 얼마나 힘들었는지 알아?

translation.en: It'll be better if I take a home equity loan and do everything myself.
translation.ko: 주택 담보 대출이라도 받아서 나 혼자 하는 게 훨씬 낫겠어

translation.en: That man uprooted his life to move here to help us.
But if you really want me to, I'll ask him to nullify the contract
translation.ko: 하지만 네 마음이 정 그렇다면 계약 취소하자고 말해 볼게

translation.en: and I'll refund him the payment.
What about that little cottage you were thinking about buying?
translation.ko: 오빠가 사고 싶어 하던 주택은 어떡하려고?

translation.en: Don't worry about that.
There are other places that Ophelia and I can rent.
translation.ko: 오필리아랑 나는 다른 집 임대해서 살아도 되니까

translation.en: Kerrie, I didn't want you to be financially strapped by taking out a loan.
translation.ko: 케리 난 네가 대출받아서 돈에 쪼들리길 바라지 않아

translation.en: That's why I thought Brooks was the perfect solution for both of us.
translation.ko: 그래서 브룩스에게 부탁하는 게 최선의 방법이라고 생각했지

translation.en: But we'll figure something else out.
Okay. Okay, I might be overreacting.
translation.ko: 그래, 내가 좀 지나치게 반응한 것 같아

translation.en: It's probably just the shock of seeing him again.
But you're right, high school was a long time ago.
translation.ko: 오빠 말이 맞아 고등학교는 오래전 일이지

translation.en: I'll give it a try. But if it doesn't work out…
translation.ko: 한번 해 볼게 하지만 만약에 잘 안되면…

translation.en: Then you can take out that home equity loan
and you can buy him out.
If it doesn't work out, I will.
It's a good thing you're moving so far away.
translation.ko: - 오빠가 멀리 가서 다행이네 - 언젠가는 내게 고마워할걸

translation.en: -You will thank me for this one day. -Don't count on it.
translation.ko: - 오빠가 멀리 가서 다행이네 - 언젠가는 내게 고마워할걸 너무 기대하지는 마

translation.en: Come on, let's go back in and enjoy
translation.ko: 자, 들어가자 네가 날 위해 준비해 준 송별회인데

translation.en: this wonderful going-away party that you organized for me.
translation.ko: 네가 날 위해 준비해 준 송별회인데 들어가서 실컷 즐겨야지

translation.en: Fine.
I can't believe Brooks McLead is my business partner.
translation.ko: 내가 브룩스 매클리드와 사업 파트너가 되다니

translation.en: -Have you heard from Jake? -Oh, yeah.
He arrived safely and he's getting settled into their new place.
translation.ko: 응, 무사히 도착했고 지금 새집에 짐 풀고 있대

translation.en: -So far, they love Silchester. -Good.
translation.ko: 일단은 실체스터가 마음에 드나 봐 잘됐네

translation.en: So how do you know Brooks again?
High school. He and Jake were two years ahead of me.
translation.ko: 고등학교 때부터 알았어 브룩스랑 제이크가 두 학년 위였지

translation.en: Oh, you were all friends? I wouldn't say that.
Brooks was always at our house, but he just teased me relentlessly.
translation.ko: 브룩스가 맨날 우리 집에 와서 날 계속 놀려 댔거든

translation.en: He was always picking on me. I couldn't stand to be in the same room with him.
translation.ko: 계속 날 괴롭히는 통에 난 같은 방에 있는 것도 싫어했어

translation.en: A bully? No, nothing like that.
You know, he just was popular and athletic, handsome. You know, that type.
translation.ko: 그냥 인기 많고 운동 잘하고 잘생긴 그런 애들 있잖아

translation.en: I swear, I was the only girl in school that didn't treat him like royalty.
translation.ko: 걔를 왕자님처럼 모시지 않은 건 나뿐이었던 것 같아

translation.en: -No wonder he liked you. -What?!
translation.ko: - 그래서 그 사람이 널 좋아했구나 - 뭐?

translation.en: No.
Though there was that time…
What?
Oh, nothing. It's such a long time ago. It's meaningless now.
translation.ko: - 뭔데? - 아니야 너무 오래전 일이라 지금은 의미 없어

translation.en: Okay.
It was his senior year, he was hanging out at our house waiting for Jake,
translation.ko: 두 사람이 졸업반일 때 브룩스가 우리 집에서 제이크를 기다리면서

translation.en: eating everything in the kitchen, I might add.
translation.ko: 주방에 있는 음식을 다 먹어 치우고 있다가

translation.en: And he mentioned that he didn't have a date for the Winter Snowball Dance.
translation.ko: 겨울 눈꽃 무도회에 같이 갈 파트너를 못 구했다는 말이 나왔어

translation.en: What happened?
Well, he said he would have a better time going with me
than any of the other girls in school.
translation.ko: 나랑 가는 게 즐거울 것 같다고 하더라고

translation.en: Okay, maybe I didn't dislike him as much as I thought I did back then.
translation.ko: 그래, 그때 난 생각보다 걔를 덜 싫어했는지도 모르지

translation.en: I thought he meant what he said.
translation.ko: 나는 그 말이 진심인 줄 알고

translation.en: I thought I was his date.
The night of the dance, he never showed up.
translation.ko: 하지만 정작 무도회 날에 그 애는 오지 않았고

translation.en: Come to find out he took Erin Smythe, captain of the cheerleaders, instead.
translation.ko: 알고 보니 에린 스미스라는 치어리더부 주장이랑 같이 갔더라

translation.en: Oh, no. Did he have any idea that you thought he'd asked you?
translation.ko: 저런, 그 사람은 네가 그렇게 생각한 줄 알았을까?

translation.en: Probably not.
I don't know. I avoided talking to him after that.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 모르겠어 그 이후로 내가 피해 다녔거든

translation.en: And then he moved after graduation.
translation.ko: 그 애는 졸업 후에 이사 갔고

translation.en: I'm sorry. It must have been devastating to your sweet little teenage heart.
translation.ko: 저런, 사춘기 소녀의 여린 가슴에 상처로 남았겠네

translation.en: Well, it was at the time.
Now, I just hope he remains a silent partner that stays--
translation.ko: 지금은 그냥 존재감 없는 파트너로 있어 주길…

translation.en: [Brooks] Hello!
Or not.
Oh, hi!
Good morning.
All right, ready to get started.
Jake used to bring me here all the time.
This is like my favorite place.
Your parents were always so nice to me.
What are you doing?
Um, I just thought I would promote some of the higher-priced products
by putting them in the customers' eyeline.
translation.ko: 홍보도 되고 좋을 것 같은데 그래도 될까?

translation.en: I'm not manipulating my customers into buying anything they don't want.
translation.ko: 난 내 가게에서 생각에도 없는 걸 사도록 손님들 조종하고 싶지 않아

translation.en: I think you mean our customers.
I'm not interested in manipulating them either,
but they can't buy what they can't see.
translation.ko: 하지만 눈에 보이지 않으면 살 수가 없잖아 평균적으로 손님이 매장을 찾을 때

translation.en: The average shopper makes three unplanned or impulse purchases
translation.ko: 평균적으로 손님이 매장을 찾을 때 10번 중 4번은 충동구매로 물건을 3개씩 구입해

translation.en: on four out of every ten store visits.
Let me guess, you're upping the odds?
Exactly.
So… do you think we could move the cash register over the candy counter?
translation.ko: 그리고 계산대를 사탕 진열대 쪽으로 옮겨도 될까?

translation.en: What do you know about candy making?
translation.ko: - 사탕 제조에 관해 아는 건 있어? - 전혀 몰라

translation.en: Absolutely nothing. Although candy is my favorite food group.
translation.ko: - 사탕 제조에 관해 아는 건 있어? - 전혀 몰라 사탕류를 진짜 좋아하기는 해

translation.en: -It's a bad idea. -What's that?
Oh, I said, "I have an idea."
We need to get a raffle prize for Winterfest.
translation.ko: 윈터페스트에 경품으로 보낼 상품을 준비해야 해

translation.en: All the vendors donate something,
and then the money raised goes to the local schools' arts programs.
translation.ko: 그렇게 모은 돈으로 지역 학교의 예술 수업을 후원하지

translation.en: I can take care of that.
Great. Thank you.
Oh! Hello, young man. What's your name?
translation.ko: - 안녕, 꼬마 손님? 이름이 뭐니? - 제임스예요

translation.en: -James. -James, are you here alone?
translation.ko: - 안녕, 꼬마 손님? 이름이 뭐니? - 제임스예요 제임스, 너 혼자 왔니?

translation.en: No. My mom is shopping next door.
translation.ko: 아니요, 엄마는 옆 가게에서 쇼핑 중이에요

translation.en: How can I help you?
I want to get one for my mom, one for Nana, and one for Lily.
translation.ko: 하나는 엄마, 하나는 할머니 하나는 릴리 줄래요

translation.en: Aren't you a sweetheart! Is Lily your sister?
No. She's my girlfriend.
She's a girl and she's my best friend.
Okay, I see you have your piggybank.
Wow!
[boy] Ten…
60? [Kerrie] Yeah.
Do I have enough?
You have the exact right amount.
Here you go, my friend.
And this is a little something extra for you.
You got everything?
All right, hang on, let me get the door for you.
You go straight to your mom, okay?
-Thanks. Bye. -Bye, honey.
What a cutie pie!
Very cute.
Out of curiosity, how much free product do you give away each month?
translation.ko: 그냥 궁금해서 묻는 건데 매달 공짜로 주는 양이 얼마나 돼?

translation.en: -I don't know, I've never counted. -Oh.
-Is that a problem? -Uh, I hope not.
Brooks, you remember Alexandra from Jake's going-away party?
Yeah, of course. Hello. How are you?
translation.ko: 맞아, 안녕하세요? - 별일 없죠? - 네, 바쁘죠

translation.en: Hi. Busy! Winterfest is ten days away.
translation.ko: - 별일 없죠? - 네, 바쁘죠 - 그래요 - 윈터페스트가 열흘 남았으니까요

translation.en: Yeah. So glad it's still a tradition.
I have some very fun memories from Winterfest.
Oh, it gets bigger every year.
It used to be a couple of hours after the student dance,
translation.ko: 예전에는 학교 무도회 후에 몇 시간쯤 하는 게 다였는데

translation.en: now it's a full day and evening event for the entire community.
translation.ko: 지금은 마을 전체가 온종일 축제를 즐기죠

translation.en: Oh! Excuse me.
Hi, honey.
Um, does she clock out to take personal calls?
translation.ko: 개인 전화 받는 시간은 근무 시간에서 제외하고 있어?

translation.en: Alexandra helps take care of her five-year-old niece,
so she can take a personal call whenever she needs to
for however long she needs to without punching a clock.
translation.ko: 근무 시간에서 빼지 않고 다 받을 수 있어

translation.en: Okay, just getting to know your modus operandi.
translation.ko: 그래, 난 그냥 네 운영 방침을 알아가는 중이야

translation.en: We are a family owned and operated business.
translation.ko: 우리는 가족이 소유하고 가족이 운영하는 가게야

translation.en: Our M.O. is we treat everyone like family.
translation.ko: 모두를 가족처럼 대하는 게 운영 방침이지

translation.en: Good. Good to know.
Listen, are you free to get together for lunch,
translation.ko: 혹시 점심 같이 먹을 시간 돼?

translation.en: discuss our business plan?
Oh, I can't, I'm really busy.
What about dinner?
You have to eat at some point of the day, don't you?
translation.ko: 그래도 하루 중 언젠가는 밥을 먹을 거 아냐

translation.en: Okay. Dinner.
A quick dinner. -Quick dinner. -Mm-hmm.
Great, I'll make a reservation. Anywhere you like.
translation.ko: 그래, 내가 예약할게 네가 원하는 데로 골라

translation.en: -Adam's Eatery is fine. -Okay.
Say 5 p.m.?
-Five is fine. -Excellent.
Hey, hey! Hey, sorry I'm late.
I got caught on a call for a different business venture.
translation.ko: 신규 사업 제안이 와서 통화하느라 늦었어

translation.en: I understand that happens, and it's not a problem,
translation.ko: 그럴 수 있다는 거 알고 별문제는 안 되지만

translation.en: but any time you're gonna be 15 minutes late,
translation.ko: 그럴 수 있다는 거 알고 별문제는 안 되지만 15분이나 늦을 때는 문자 메시지를 주면 고맙겠어

translation.en: a text would be appreciated.
translation.ko: 15분이나 늦을 때는 문자 메시지를 주면 고맙겠어

translation.en: You're right. That was rude of me not to text you.
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞아 문자도 안 하다니 내가 잘못했네

translation.en: I apologize.
Thank you.
I don't know if you remember, but this used to be Margolita's.
Mr. and Mrs. Sanchez retired.
Oh, that's too bad. I like this place.
translation.ko: 아쉽다, 여기 좋아했는데 칩스 앤 살사가 정말 맛있었잖아

translation.en: -They had the best chips and salsa. -You're right, they did.
translation.ko: 아쉽다, 여기 좋아했는데 칩스 앤 살사가 정말 맛있었잖아 - 맞아, 맛있었지 - 응

translation.en: -Yeah. -Adam took over several years ago.
translation.ko: - 맞아, 맛있었지 - 응 몇 년 전에 애덤이 인수했어 우리 마을 최고의 요리사야

translation.en: He is really the best chef in town.
translation.ko: 몇 년 전에 애덤이 인수했어 우리 마을 최고의 요리사야

translation.en: -Oh! Oh! I'm sorry. -Sorry. I got it.
translation.ko: 이런, 미안 - 내가 미안해 - 자, 여기

translation.en: Sorry. Okay, thanks.
-Ooh! -I didn't--
I got it.
[clears throat] Yeah.
-Sorry. -Yeah, that's okay.
-Is it broken? -No, all good.
-Shall we go in? -Yeah.
-Thank you. -You were right, that was delicious.
translation.ko: - 고맙습니다 - 네 말이 맞네, 정말 맛있었어

translation.en: Well, I usually am. Right.
I'll be sure to keep that in mind.
Okay. I went through the shop's entire history.
translation.ko: 내가 우리 가게의 역사를 처음부터 훑어봤거든

translation.en: Oh. You're thorough.
Uh-huh. Before I buy any business, I do all the research.
translation.ko: 난 원래 사업체 인수하기 전에 전부 조사해

translation.en: Oh, your great grandparents, they have a very impressive history.
Well, they did bring their candy making secrets over from Europe.
translation.ko: 유럽의 사탕 제조 비법을 여기로 들여오셨지

translation.en: Here's a list of things I think we should consider implementing.
translation.ko: 우리가 시행해 볼 만한 정책을 목록으로 정리해 봤어

translation.en: The business is not in trouble, but we could be doing a lot better.
translation.ko: 지금도 경영에는 문제없지만 더 잘할 수 있을 것 같아

translation.en: "Change name to Murphy & McLead Candy & Gift shop"?
[chuckles] No. No, absolutely not.
[laughs] You're right, that's a bad idea.
I think it's important to preserve the original brand name,
translation.ko: 브랜드의 원래 이름을 유지하는 게 중요하니

translation.en: not necessarily change it.
You're right.
"Create an employee handbook"?
We only have one full-time employee.
For now, but what if we expand or franchise?
translation.ko: 지금은 그렇지만, 더 커지거나 프랜차이즈가 될 수도 있잖아

translation.en: It's important to have everything in writing.
translation.ko: 모든 걸 문서화해 두는 게 중요하거든

translation.en: That way, there aren't a lot of miscommunications.
You're very by-the-book, aren't you?
I'm a businessman, that's what I know.
Candy, good candy, makes people happy.
That was my great grandparents' mission, and it's mine too.
translation.ko: 그게 증조부모님의 신념이었어 내 신념이기도 해

translation.en: That's what I know.
I admire that, I really do.
And my purpose is to create more profit. That's for all of our sakes.
translation.ko: 하지만 나는 이윤을 늘리고 싶어 그게 우리 모두에게 좋잖아

translation.en: How is everything here?
-Oh. -Good. Fabulous, thank you.
The roast sirloin rivals anything I've ever had in New York City.
translation.ko: 이렇게 맛있는 등심구이는 뉴욕에서도 먹어 본 적 없어요

translation.en: I'll gladly take that compliment.
Good to see you. Give Alexandra my best.
I will. [clears throat]
Well… I thank you for dinner.
As much as I would like to stick around and discuss
translation.ko: 나도 마음 같아서는 마케팅 전략과 새로운 간판에 관해 더 의논하고 싶지만

translation.en: marketing strategies and new signage,
translation.ko: 마케팅 전략과 새로운 간판에 관해 더 의논하고 싶지만

translation.en: I need to get back to my candy molds.
translation.ko: 이만 사탕 만들러 가야 할 것 같아

translation.en: Because without them, we won't have a business.
translation.ko: 사탕이 없으면 사업 자체가 안 되잖아

translation.en: -Let me get the check. -Oh, no, I've got it. That's fine.
Thank you.
It's a business expense so it's a write-off.
Right.
-Hey. -Hey, morning.
You're here early.
As Ben Franklin says,
translation.ko: 벤자민 프랭클린이 이렇게 말했지 '일찍 자고 일찍 일어나면'

translation.en: "Early to bed, early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise."
translation.ko: 벤자민 프랭클린이 이렇게 말했지 '일찍 자고 일찍 일어나면' '건강해지고 부유해지고 현명해진다'

translation.en: Where does that leave the artist who finds their creativity at night?
translation.ko: 그럼 밤에 창의력을 발휘하는 예술가들은 어떡하라고?

translation.en: It's a really good point.
Speaking of creativity, I want you to look at our new website.
translation.ko: 창의력 얘기가 나와서 말인데 새로 만든 홈페이지 한번 볼래?

translation.en: What was wrong with our old website?
No, nothing. I just wanted to run a few ideas by you.
translation.ko: 그냥 아이디어를 좀 내 봤으니 네 생각을 들려줘

translation.en: Where's the picture of my great grandparents?
It's right here, I moved it to the history page.
-You changed the logo?! -No, those are just options.
translation.ko: 로고도 바꿨어? 아니, 그냥 선택지로 만들어 둔 것뿐이야

translation.en: You could see them in case you liked any of them.
translation.ko: 직접 보면 좋아할 수도 있을 것 같아서

translation.en: -You don't waste any time. -No, wasted time, wasted profit.
translation.ko: 시간을 허투루 안 쓰는구나 시간을 허투루 쓰면 돈도 허투루 나가

translation.en: -Did Ben Franklin say that too? -No, that was me.
translation.ko: - 그것도 벤자민 프랭클린이야? - 아니, 내가 한 말이야

translation.en: I've always been partial to "don't fix what isn't broken."
translation.ko: 나는 망가지지 않는 이상 고치지 말자는 주의야

translation.en: You'd be amazed what a great website
and a strong social media presence does for a business.
translation.ko: 사업체에 미치는 영향을 알면 깜짝 놀랄걸?

translation.en: -We need to expand our reach. -Brooks, I don't have time for this.
translation.ko: - 사업 범위를 더 넓혀야 해 - 난 지금 이럴 시간 없어

translation.en: That's what I'm here for.
Right.
Okay. Anything else?
We could offer free Wi-Fi, then, after the Winterfest, open a coffee bar in here
translation.ko: 무료 와이파이를 설치하고 윈터페스트가 끝나면 사람들이 모이는 카페로 만들어도 좋을 것 같아

translation.en: so people can come in and hang out.
translation.ko: 사람들이 모이는 카페로 만들어도 좋을 것 같아

translation.en: Actually, that's not a bad idea. And a hot chocolate bar.
translation.ko: 그거 나쁘지 않은 생각이야 핫초코도 메뉴로 내자 마침 핫초코 폭탄이라는 음료를 개발하고 있거든

translation.en: I've been working with this new drink called a "hot cocoa bomb."
translation.ko: 마침 핫초코 폭탄이라는 음료를 개발하고 있거든

translation.en: [Brooks] I'm not sure we have enough space.
We might have to knock down a few walls, expand a little bit. Maybe find new premises?
translation.ko: 벽을 조금 허물고 확장하거나 다른 부지를 찾아볼까?

translation.en: No, I'm not knocking down walls. Or moving.
translation.ko: 아니, 벽도 안 허물 거고 이전도 안 할 거야

translation.en: After we expand, we have to outsource the candy-making to a factory.
translation.ko: 확장한 다음에 사탕 제조는 공장에 외주로 맡기자

translation.en: -What? -This will be our flagship store.
translation.ko: - 뭐라고? - 여기는 대표 지점으로 두면 돼

translation.en: If we invest in it, it's gonna be fine. This font is driving me crazy.
translation.ko: 잘 투자하면 괜찮을 거야 그나저나 폰트 때문에 미치겠네

translation.en: Fine, you work on the font, I'm gonna open the shop.
translation.ko: 그래, 너는 폰트 작업해 나는 가게 열어야겠다

translation.en: Are you emailing Megan?
Yes. I'm filling her in on what's happening around here,
how Brooks wants to change the name of the shop, change the logo,
translation.ko: 브룩스가 가게 이름도 바꾸고 로고도 바꾸고

translation.en: knock the walls down and expand.
You know he wants to find a factory to make the candy?
translation.ko: 심지어 사탕 제조는 공장에 맡기자고 하더라

translation.en: Yeah, he's… very enthusiastic.
And presumptuous, and as arrogant as ever.
I told Jake I'd give this a try, but it just isn't working.
translation.ko: 오빠에겐 노력해 보겠다고 했지만 역시 안 맞아

translation.en: Isn't it too late now?
We'll see about that.
So you own half of Murphy's Candies & Gifts.
translation.ko: 머피의 사탕 가게 지분의 절반을 가지고 계신다고요?

translation.en: Yes.
To make sure I'm clear, you want to buy out this new partner you told me about?
translation.ko: 새로운 파트너의 지분을 다시 사들이고 싶으시다는 건가요?

translation.en: That's my plan.
And what do you have as collateral on a loan?
translation.ko: 대출 담보로 삼을 만한 재산이 있나요?

translation.en: I don't have much savings, but I do have my family home.
translation.ko: 저축액은 크지 않은데 가족 소유의 주택이 있어요

translation.en: My parents put it in my name before they passed.
translation.ko: 부모님이 돌아가시기 전에 제 명의로 바꿔 주셨죠

translation.en: I'm sorry for your loss.
-And the house is fully paid off? -Yes.
I wanted to inquire about a home equity loan.
translation.ko: 주택 담보 대출은 어떤지 상담하고 싶었어요

translation.en: I always recommend a home equity loan over using your house as collateral.
translation.ko: 저는 언제나 주택 담보 대출을 추천하는 편입니다

translation.en: You have a solid credit rating and no debt.
translation.ko: 고객님은 신용 등급도 좋고 부채도 없군요

translation.en: Let me see what I can do, and hopefully he won't be your partner much longer.
translation.ko: 방법을 찾아보겠습니다 사업 파트너는 금방 정리되겠네요

translation.en: I'm really sorry, but your ex-husband didn't sign a quitclaim.
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 권리 양도 문서에 전 남편분의 서명이 빠졌군요

translation.en: You're gonna have to get him to sign one to clear the title.
translation.ko: 그분의 서명을 받고 공증받아야 온전히 고객 명의가 됩니다

translation.en: Oh, no, I thought he signed that.
Well, that's gonna take some time.
According to my daughter, he's in some remote part of Mexico
translation.ko: 딸아이에게 듣자 하니 그 사람은 멕시코 오지에서

translation.en: working for the next six months.
Oh, no!
This means I'm stuck with that obnoxious, controlling, egoist
translation.ko: 재수 없고 강압적이고 자기중심적인 사업 파트너를 더 참고 견뎌야겠네요

translation.en: for a business partner!
-[ball rattles in hole] -Okay, this is it.
Yee!
-You cheatin', kid? -It's putting, how could I cheat?
Hey, where is my chocolate?
You own half of the best candy store in town, don't you?
translation.ko: 마을 최고 사탕 가게의 지분을 절반이나 샀다며

translation.en: Sorry, yeah, I forgot. Next time.
-What's the matter? Something wrong? -Nah, it's…
translation.ko: - 왜 그래? 무슨 일 있어? - 아니요

translation.en: It's not going as smoothly as expected.
Well, unlike you, most people resist change.
translation.ko: 그야 보통 사람들은 너와 달리 변화를 거부하거든

translation.en: Yeah, but all I'm trying to do is turn a bigger profit, that helps everybody.
translation.ko: 하지만 수익을 더 키우면 모두에게 좋은 법이잖아요

translation.en: And everything I suggest, everything, upsets her.
translation.ko: 그런데 제가 뭘 제안하든 전부 기분 나빠하더라고요

translation.en: It's a dilemma.
Oh! Did you see that?
Nice shot, Dad.
It's like your mother used to say, "There's a lid for every pot."
translation.ko: 너희 엄마 말버릇이었지 '모든 냄비엔 맞는 뚜껑이 있다'

translation.en: What's that got to do with anything?
translation.ko: - 그 말이 여기서 왜 나와요? - 글쎄다

translation.en: She also used to say that, "At the end, it's people, not things, that matter."
translation.ko: 또 이런 말도 했어 '결국 중요한 것은 재물이 아니라 사람이다'

translation.en: And what do you say?
Well, I say that…
translation.ko: 내 생각에는 네 입장에서만 생각하지 말고

translation.en: maybe you should look at the situation
from your new partner's point of view, instead of just your own.
translation.ko: 새로운 사업 파트너의 입장에서 상황을 바라봐도 좋겠구나

translation.en: Okay. From Kerrie's perspective?
Yeah, this is a lot of change for someone who's had no change their whole life.
translation.ko: 평생 변화 없이 산 사람에게는 너무 큰 변화일 수 있겠네요

translation.en: Yeah.
That can't be easy.
Here you go, Mac, have a great day. All right.
translation.ko: 여기요, 좋은 하루 보내세요 잘 가요

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
Hi.
-Don't say it. -Say what?
That you might have been right about moving the register.
translation.ko: 계산대를 옮기는 건 네 생각이 옳았던 것 같아

translation.en: Oh. No, I didn't say a word.
Yeah, well, you didn't have to. I can see it all over your face.
translation.ko: 그래, 말로 안 해도 벌써 표정에 다 드러났거든

translation.en: I can't help it if you're a highly perceptive woman.
translation.ko: 네가 눈치가 빠른 건 내 탓이 아니잖아

translation.en: I got you something.
Yeah.
-That's for me? -Yeah, you said we needed it.
translation.ko: - 여기 - 나 주는 거야? 응, 필요하다고 했잖아

translation.en: -What? -It's the prize for the raffle.
It's a jellybean jar, Bean.
Yeah, great, I see that.
Okay. You like it?
-It's perfect. -Okay.
translation.ko: - 마음에 들어? - 완벽해 그래, 그리고 진열장도 가져왔어

translation.en: Listen, I think this display case is gonna fit perfectly.
translation.ko: 그래, 그리고 진열장도 가져왔어 여기 딱 맞을 거야 조립만 하면 돼

translation.en: I just have to put it together.
translation.ko: 여기 딱 맞을 거야 조립만 하면 돼

translation.en: Jelly beans! That's funny!
Oh, yeah, real funny.
Oh, dear.
I better go help him before he ruins the whole shop.
translation.ko: 쟤가 가게 다 부수기 전에 가서 도와줘야겠다

translation.en: Take it easy on him. He means well.
translation.ko: 살살 대해 줘 좋은 뜻으로 그러는 거잖아

translation.en: -Fiddlesticks. -Is everything okay?
Oh, yeah, it's fine.
You know, I didn't realize you and my brother kept in touch all these years.
translation.ko: 난 너랑 오빠가 계속 연락하고 지낸 줄 몰랐어

translation.en: He never mentioned anything.
I thought about it through the years, but we connected
translation.ko: 항상 생각은 했는데 사실은 고등학교 SNS에서 보고 연락한 거야

translation.en: on our high-school class's social media page.
translation.ko: 사실은 고등학교 SNS에서 보고 연락한 거야

translation.en: Oh. I'm surprised you left an exciting city like New York.
translation.ko: 뉴욕처럼 재밌는 도시를 떠나다니 좀 의외이긴 해

translation.en: Well, I had my reasons, you know.
Don't know if you remember this, but my dad was in the Air Force.
translation.ko: 기억하는지 모르겠지만 우리 아빠가 공군에 계셨거든

translation.en: Right, I did know that.
Because of his job, we had to move all the time.
translation.ko: 아버지 일 때문에 이사를 자주 다녔고

translation.en: I… just kind of got used to that.
translation.ko: 나중엔 그런 생활에 익숙해졌지 2년 이상 머문 적이 없는 것 같아

translation.en: I've never lived anywhere longer than two years, you know?
translation.ko: 나중엔 그런 생활에 익숙해졌지 2년 이상 머문 적이 없는 것 같아 그래서 슬슬 변화를 줘야 할 때라고 생각했어

translation.en: So I guess it was time for me to make a change.
translation.ko: 그래서 슬슬 변화를 줘야 할 때라고 생각했어

translation.en: That must be hard on your friendships or relationships.
Yeah, I guess so.
But, you know, I get restless, just get that restless feeling.
translation.ko: 난 늘 불안해하거든 떠나고 싶은 마음이 들어서 안절부절못해, 뭔지 알지?

translation.en: I wanna move, you know?
translation.ko: 떠나고 싶은 마음이 들어서 안절부절못해, 뭔지 알지?

translation.en: No, I actually don't know.
I'm not a big fan of change.
I've lived in the same house in the same town and had the same job…
translation.ko: 평생 같은 마을, 같은 집에 살면서 같은 일을 하고 살았어

translation.en: well, apart from baby-sitting… my whole life.
What about college?
Well, the university's regional campus was 30 miles away so I lived at home.
translation.ko: 대학 지역 캠퍼스가 50km 거리에 있어서 그냥 집에서 다녔지

translation.en: Unlike my daughter, who went as far away as possible.
translation.ko: 반대로 내 딸은 저 멀리로 날아가 버렸지만 말이야

translation.en: -You must have missed her, I'm sure. -Very much.
But she is following her dreams, and I'm really proud of her.
translation.ko: 하지만 자기 꿈을 좇아 간 거잖아 정말 대견해

translation.en: That's amazing.
Yeah. She tells me about her adventures.
But I like it here in Bedford.
I'm content.
You're content or you're happy?
Well, aren't they the same thing?
Well, no, not really.
Isn't there anything you've wanted to do that's not in this little town?
translation.ko: 이 마을 말고 다른 데서 해 보고 싶은 일은 없어?

translation.en: I have always wanted to go to Europe.
My great grandparents, they're from a small village in Belgium.
It's actually where they learned their candy-making secrets.
You should go.
Just book a ticket, make a reservation, and go.
You make it sound so easy.
I mean, between school and taking care of my parents
and raising Megan and then taking over at the shop,
there just was never enough time.
But I'm sure I'll get there one day.
translation.ko: 하지만 언젠가는 갈 수 있을 거야

translation.en: I hope you do.
I guess I better get back to the kitchen.
[Alexandra] Yes, I'm her aunt.
Does she have a temperature?
No? Okay, good. I'm on my way.
Is everything okay?
translation.ko: - 무슨 일 있어? - 학교 보건실에서 연락 왔어

translation.en: That was the school nurse. Paige isn't well. I have to take her home.
translation.ko: - 무슨 일 있어? - 학교 보건실에서 연락 왔어 페이지가 몸이 안 좋대 집에 데려다줘야겠어

translation.en: -Take your time, I hope she feels better. -Thanks.
translation.ko: - 천천히 갔다 와, 빨리 낫길 바라 - 고마워

translation.en: Oh, hi.
Bye.
-Where's the fire? -She had to get her niece.
Oh, okay. Um…
Listen, can we meet for lunch? My treat?
translation.ko: 그렇구나, 있잖아 우리 점심 같이 먹을래? 내가 살게

translation.en: I would love that, but with Winterfest five days away, I am so busy.
translation.ko: 나도 그러고 싶지만 윈터페스트가 닷새 후라 너무 바빠

translation.en: That's exactly what we need to discuss.
But if you're busy, I'll go get sandwiches and we can eat here.
translation.ko: 하지만 너무 바쁘다면 샌드위치 사 와서 여기서 먹자

translation.en: Yeah…
That's okay, I could probably use some fresh air.
translation.ko: 하지만… 아니, 괜찮아 나도 바람 좀 쐬고 오지 뭐

translation.en: -Just give me 20 minutes to finish this. -Great.
-I'll meet you in the square? -Yes.
Great.
May I have one?
Are you gonna personally cover the cost for that?
You know I'm good for it.
Okay.
Wow!
That's amazing.
That's even better than I remembered it.
I've had gourmet chocolate that doesn't compare to that.
translation.ko: 전 세계의 고급 초콜릿과 비교해도 월등하게 훌륭해

translation.en: That means a lot. Thank you.
translation.ko: 그거 감동이네 - 고마워 - 우린 가격대를 너무 낮게 뒀어

translation.en: -Our price point is way too low. -Oh, here we go.
translation.ko: - 고마워 - 우린 가격대를 너무 낮게 뒀어 또 시작이네

translation.en: No, you're way undervaluing the product.
translation.ko: 아니, 네가 제품의 가치를 너무 낮게 뒀다는 뜻이야

translation.en: I really appreciate the compliment,
but there are a lot of hardworking people in this town trying to make ends meet
translation.ko: 이 마을에는 열심히 일해서 간신히 먹고사는 사람들이 많아

translation.en: and they shouldn't have to budget to treat themselves to some candy.
translation.ko: 그런 사람들이 사탕 좀 사 먹는 데 큰돈이 들면 안 되잖아

translation.en: Okay, point taken.
-I'll see you in the square. -Yeah.
So good!
-Brooks! -Hi.
Erin Smythe? We went to high school together.
translation.ko: 에린 스미스야 우리 고등학교 같이 다녔잖아

translation.en: [Brooks] That's right. Hi, how are you? Nice to see you.
So, what have you been doing? Where are you living now?
translation.ko: 그동안 잘 지냈어? 지금은 어디 살아? 직장은? 전부 말해 줘

translation.en: Tell me everything.
translation.ko: 지금은 어디 살아? 직장은? 전부 말해 줘

translation.en: My parents still have a place here, and I have a satellite office in Cincinnati.
translation.ko: 부모님이 아직 여기에 사시고 나는 신시내티에 지사가 있어

translation.en: I am an executive headhunter.
-That's impressive. -What's impressive is your career.
translation.ko: 대단하네 네 커리어가 더 대단하던걸 난 수년간 널 지켜봤어

translation.en: -I've been watching it over the years. -I've been very fortunate.
translation.ko: 네 커리어가 더 대단하던걸 난 수년간 널 지켜봤어 나야 운이 좋았지

translation.en: What surprised me was the candy shop. That's such a huge departure from your usual ventures.
translation.ko: 그래도 사탕 가게 일은 놀랍더라 평소에 하던 사업과는 다르잖아

translation.en: It is, but it's nice to be back here in Bedford.
translation.ko: 맞아, 하지만 베드퍼드로 다시 오니까 참 좋아

translation.en: -Hi. -Hey.
I don't mean to interrupt. We can talk later.
No, Kerrie, you remember Erin Smythe? Still the last name you go by?
translation.ko: 아니야, 케리 에린 스미스 알지? 아직도 스미스 성 써 ?

translation.en: Yes, I never married.
Oh, yeah, I sure do.
-Erin, how are you? -Good, thanks for asking.
translation.ko: 그래, 물론 기억하지 에린, 안녕하세요? 네, 안녕해요

translation.en: This is Kerrie, Jake's little sister, my new business partner.
translation.ko: 이쪽은 제이크의 동생 케리야 나의 새 사업 파트너지

translation.en: Oh, Jake, I adored him. He was the best.
translation.ko: 제이크, 내가 정말 좋아했지 멋진 친구였어

translation.en: He still is. I'll tell him you said hello.
translation.ko: 지금도 그래요 - 오빠에게 안부 전해 줄게요 - 그렇게 해줘요

translation.en: -Please do. -You gotta come by the shop sometime.
translation.ko: - 오빠에게 안부 전해 줄게요 - 그렇게 해줘요 나중에 가게에 한번 들러

translation.en: She makes the most unbelievable chocolate and candies…
translation.ko: 케리가 만드는 사탕과 초콜릿은 정말 굉장하거든

translation.en: Sounds delicious, but I don't eat sugar.
translation.ko: 정말 맛있겠네 하지만 난 설탕을 안 먹어

translation.en: [sighs] I don't want to keep you two from your business, so…
translation.ko: 두 사람은 일 얘기 해야 하니 이만 보내줄게 우리는 나중에 다시 얘기하자

translation.en: -We should catch up more later. -I'd love that. Okay, great.
translation.ko: 우리는 나중에 다시 얘기하자 - 그래, 그거 좋겠다 - 응, 갈게

translation.en: Uh… Italian or turkey?
Ooh! Italian.
-Hey. -Oh, thank you.
I have been going through the financials for the past five years.
I think, with a few changes…
we can double last year's numbers.
translation.ko: 작년 실적의 두 배는 가능할 것 같아

translation.en: This is the amount of free product that was given away last year.
translation.ko: 작년에 무료로 나간 제품의 수량을 정리한 자료야

translation.en: I thought that was a charitable tax write-off.
translation.ko: 뭐? 난 기부니까 세액 공제되는 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Charity is a wonderful thing.
But I think that number's way too high.
There are a lot of deserving people, Brooks.
There's first responders, teachers, the elderly at the Senior Village.
You are a bleeding heart, Kerrie Murphy.
translation.ko: 넌 마음이 너무 약해, 케리 머피

translation.en: Yes. It bleeds candy.
translation.ko: 응, 그래서 사탕을 줄줄 흘리고 다니지

translation.en: Not everything is about the bottom line.
When you're running a business and trying to be in the black, it is.
translation.ko: 사업체를 운영하면서 흑자를 내려면, 그게 전부이긴 해

translation.en: If that's all you care about, why did you buy into a small, family-owned business?
translation.ko: 그런 걸 따지는 사람이 작은 가족 가게를 왜 인수한 거야?

translation.en: We are a far cry from a Fortune 500 company.
No, I see great potential.
Why did you buy Jake out?
'Cause Willy Wonka's my favorite movie. I always wanted to own a candy factory.
translation.ko: 영화 '찰리와 초콜릿공장'을 정말 좋아하거든 예전부터 사탕 공장을 갖고 싶었어

translation.en: I'm sorry we don't have a chocolate river for you to fall in.
translation.ko: 우리 가게엔 초콜릿 강이 없으니 미안하게 됐네

translation.en: Or Oompa Loompas. That would be great, wouldn't it?
translation.ko: 움파룸파도 조수로 있었다면 정말 편했을 거야

translation.en: That's important, a strong work/life balance.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 일과 삶의 균형은 대단히 중요하니까

translation.en: To the bottom line?
Well, if you're exhausted and burnt out, you're of no use to me.
translation.ko: - 수익은? - 그야 네가 지쳐서 주저앉으면 쓸모없는 인력이 되잖아

translation.en: No, but seriously.
You work all the time. You need some downtime.
translation.ko: 넌 항상 일만 하고 가게 일에 매달리잖아 가끔은 쉬는 시간도 필요해 여행이나 한 달살이 같은 거 해봐

translation.en: Why don't you take a vacation? Or a staycation.
translation.ko: 가끔은 쉬는 시간도 필요해 여행이나 한 달살이 같은 거 해봐

translation.en: It has been a while since I've had any time off.
I didn't even take a honeymoon.
Free time, I don't know what I'd do with myself.
translation.ko: 자유 시간이라니 혼자 뭘 해야 할지도 모르겠다

translation.en: Take a trip to Europe?
Alone? No.
How long's it been since you were divorced?
I mean… Sorry, that's a personal question.
That's okay. I got married relatively young. Marriage lasted about four years.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 좀 어릴 때 결혼해서 4년 정도 같이 살았어

translation.en: I naively thought that love could conquer all our differences.
translation.ko: 사랑한다면 뭐든 극복할 수 있다고 순진하게 생각했지

translation.en: But he's a good dad to Megan, and that's all that matters.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 그이가 메건의 아빠 노릇은 잘하고 있어, 그거면 충분해

translation.en: What about you?
Oh, never married, no kids.
But I am known to my friends' children as "Fun Uncle Brooks."
translation.ko: 하지만 친구 자식들 사이에선 '재밌는 브룩스 삼촌'으로 통해

translation.en: I was voted "Life of the Party" in high school, remember that?
translation.ko: 난 파티의 분위기 메이커로 뽑힌 적도 있잖아

translation.en: Oh, right!
So that's the real reason you wanted to buy into the candy store.
translation.ko: 사탕 가게를 사고 싶어 한 진짜 이유는 그거였구나

translation.en: You wanted to keep your title.
Of course. You're seeing through me now.
[Kerrie] How is Paige feeling?
It was just a tummy ache. She's back to a hundred percent.
Oh, good. I'm glad. Have you heard from Megan? How's she doing?

The important question is, are you happy here?
translation.ko: 중요한 질문은 이거야 넌 여기서 행복하니?

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
That's all that matters.
Brooks?
Kerrie! Hi. What are you doing here?
What are you doing here?
This is my dad, Joel.
Everybody calls me Papa Joel.
It is very nice to meet you, Papa Joel.
I see where Brooks gets his sparkling eyes.
And his sweet tooth. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 단것을 좋아하는 입맛도요 만나서 참 반가워요 이야기를 많이 들었거든요

translation.en: It's nicer meeting you. I've heard a lot about you.
translation.ko: 만나서 참 반가워요 이야기를 많이 들었거든요

translation.en: Oh, no. If you heard it from him, it's probably not true.
translation.ko: 브룩스를 통해 들으셨다면 아마 사실이 아닐 거예요

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, I like her.
He doesn't say that about many people. Well, I'm honored.
Uh, what are you doing here, making deliveries for Winterfest?
translation.ko: 그런데 여기서 뭐 해? 윈터페스트 상품 배달해?

translation.en: You know, you would probably consider this
a bimonthly, tax deductible charitable donation,
translation.ko: 격월마다 세금 공제용으로 기부하는 물품이라고 하겠지만

translation.en: but I like to call it,
"never showing up empty-handed when you're visiting friends."
translation.ko: '친구 만나러 갈 때 빈손일 수는 없어서'라고 할래

translation.en: Martha! That is a beautiful wreath.
I have your favorite candy. You're gonna love this.
translation.ko: 좋아하는 사탕 가져왔어요 마음에 들 거예요

translation.en: Well…
Oh! Making these winter wreaths just wears me out.
translation.ko: 화환을 한참 만들었더니 나는 너무 피곤하구나

translation.en: I'm gonna take a nap.
Oh, yeah, Dad, it's real strenuous.
And, uh, I think
that you should just go over there
and help that pretty business partner of yours.
-That's real subtle, Dad. -I'll see you later.
translation.ko: 참 눈치 빠르시네요 나중에 보자, 응?

translation.en: All right, enjoy, you guys.
-Hi. -Hi.
You need any help?
Sure. Would you mind giving this to Jack? He's over there.
translation.ko: 응, 이걸 잭에게 전해줄래? 저기 앉아 계셔

translation.en: He has allergies so I make these special for him.
translation.ko: 알레르기가 있는 분이라 특별히 따로 만들었어

translation.en: What?
Nothing. You just… you continue to surprise me.
translation.ko: 그냥 매번 네 새로운 모습을 보는 것 같아서

translation.en: Well, I could say the same about you.
Thank you for helping me.
Oh, and for not lecturing me about all the product I'm giving away.
translation.ko: 물건 공짜로 나눠준다고 잔소리 안 한 것도 고마워

translation.en: I would never do that.
Look how happy you're making everybody.
Okay, who are you and what have you done with my business partner?
translation.ko: 그래요, 당신은 대체 누구시죠? 제 사업 파트너는 어디로 갔나요?

translation.en: That's true. I have spent my whole life being obsessed with the bottom line,
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞아, 나는 평생 수익에만 집착하며 살았는데

translation.en: but I think now I'm realizing that, I don't know…
translation.ko: 이제는 조금씩 알 것 같아 인생은…

translation.en: there's more to life.
Well, I suppose without a profit,
there wouldn't be any product to give away, so…
So you're saying that we make a good team? Yeah?
translation.ko: 우린 잘 맞는 팀인 것 같지? - 응 - 그래

translation.en: Hey, when you're done with this, there's something I want to show you.
translation.ko: 여기 일 마치면 나가자 네게 보여 주고 싶은 게 있어

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah. -Okay?
I found this place when I was out with my dad.
Oh, it's really nice.
How come your dad lives here and not with you?
translation.ko: 그런데 왜 아버지랑 같이 안 살아?

translation.en: Or is that too personal? No, not at all.
He says he doesn't like my cooking.
[laughs] He's just very independent. And he also has a very active social life.
translation.ko: 아주 독립심이 강하신 분이고 사교 활동도 열심히 하셔

translation.en: I think it comes from years of living on a military base surrounded by people.
translation.ko: 오랫동안 군대에서 사람들과 같이 지내셔서 그런가 봐

translation.en: Oh, that makes sense.
I bet Papa Joel is popular with the ladies too.
He has friends, but he says that my mom was the love of his life,
his soulmate, and the only one that's truly in his heart.
translation.ko: 마음 깊숙이 자리한 운명의 단짝인 셈이지

translation.en: -That's beautiful. -Yeah.
I've always wanted to have that kind of devotion to someone, but…
translation.ko: 나도 그렇게 전부를 바칠 사람을 찾고 싶었는데…

translation.en: But you never live in one place long enough?
Okay. I accept that.
But I've answered all your questions. Come here.
translation.ko: 내가 네 질문에 대답했으니까 이리 와 봐, 나도…

translation.en: I've got some… [clears throat]
Why did you shun me so much in high school?
translation.ko: 고등학교 때 왜 날 그렇게 피해 다녔어?

translation.en: I didn't shun you.
Okay.
This is gonna sound really childish now, but…
translation.ko: 이제 와서 말하자니 너무 유치하긴 한데

translation.en: you picked on me all the time. Relentlessly.
Well, yeah, of course. You were my best friend's very cute, off-limits little sister.
translation.ko: 당연하지, 나랑 가장 친한 친구의 귀여운 동생이었는걸

translation.en: Of course I picked on you. That was my job.
translation.ko: 당연히 널 놀려야지 그게 내 역할이었으니까

translation.en: You were also very arrogant!
Okay.
Yeah.
I accept that.
I was the new kid in a new school every other year
since I was five years old, so I learned to go in strong.
translation.ko: 5살 때부터 2년마다 학교를 옮겨 다니다 보니 강하게 구는 데 익숙해졌어

translation.en: Otherwise, I'd be eaten alive.
translation.ko: 안 그러면 산 채로 잡아먹힐 것 같아서

translation.en: Kids are vicious. Especially in high school.
translation.ko: 아이들은 잔인하잖아 특히 고등학생은 더 심하고

translation.en: So it was a façade, was it?
Yeah, more than you know.
Listen, I want to apologize.
I didn't mean to pick on you. I never meant that meanly.
translation.ko: 널 괴롭히려는 마음은 없었어 못되게 굴려던 게 아냐

translation.en: I'm very sorry.
And I wanna ask you if there's anything else that I did during that time,
translation.ko: 내가 그때 또 다른 짓을 했다면 그것도 말해줘 함께 사과하고 싶어

translation.en: because I would like to apologize for that too.
Fine.
When I was a sophomore and you were a senior…
I was under the impression that you invited me
translation.ko: 나는 네가 나를 눈꽃 무도회 파트너로 초대했다고

translation.en: to be your date to the Winter Snowball Dance.
translation.ko: 나는 네가 나를 눈꽃 무도회 파트너로 초대했다고 막연히 생각했었어

translation.en: I bought a dress, I did my hair and make-up, and…
translation.ko: 그래서 드레스도 사고 머리도 하고 화장도 하고

translation.en: I waited all night and you never showed up.
I nev-- I'm so sorry, Kerrie, I never knew that I gave you that impression.
translation.ko: 정말 미안해, 케리 내가 그런 인상을 준 줄은 몰랐어

translation.en: -If I had known, I never would have-- -I know.
-I'm sorry, Bean. -Oh, that's another thing.
translation.ko: 미안해, 빈 그것도 문제야 나는 그 별명을 진짜 싫어했어

translation.en: I detested that nickname.
translation.ko: 그것도 문제야 나는 그 별명을 진짜 싫어했어 너 때문에 고등학교 시절 내내

translation.en: Because of you, in high school, I was called
translation.ko: 너 때문에 고등학교 시절 내내 온갖 종류의 별명이 나를 따라다녀거든

translation.en: every variation a person could think of.
Uh, Stinky Bean, Bossy Bean, Jelly Bean.
The list went on and on.
Sorry.
Listen, I would like you to consider forgiving me,
and I would like to ask you if this could be a fresh start for us.
translation.ko: 너만 괜찮다면 우리 관계를 새롭게 다시 시작하고 싶어

translation.en: What do you say?
Okay. Fresh start.
You never did tell me why you moved back.
translation.ko: 그런데 왜 돌아왔는지 말 안 해줬잖아

translation.en: Here? Oh, I just… Yeah, I had fond memories of Bedford.
translation.ko: 여기로? 아, 그건… 베드퍼드에 좋은 기억이 많았어

translation.en: I wanted to get out of the city, and Jake called at the right time, so…
translation.ko: 도시를 벗어나고 싶었는데 마침 제이크에게 연락이 왔지

translation.en: And, uh, also…
What?
It's nothing.
That's okay.
We should get going. Lots to do before the big day tomorrow.
translation.ko: 그만 가자 내일이 결전의 날이니 할 일이 많아

translation.en: Okay. All right, let's get to it.
Okay.
-A fresh start. -Yes. Fresh start.
translation.ko: - 그래 - 새 출발 그래, 새 출발

translation.en: I remember when you and Jake planned the senior prank
translation.ko: 너랑 제이크는 졸업 전에 무슨 장난을 칠까 고민하다가

translation.en: and you bubble-wrapped the hallways.
[chuckles] I plead the fifth.
translation.ko: 복도를 뽁뽁이로 다 둘러 놨잖아 전 묵비권을 행사하겠습니다

translation.en: Although I will say, whoever thought of that… absolute genius.
translation.ko: 다만 누구 생각인지는 몰라도 정말 기상천외하긴 하네

translation.en: It was funny.
I also remember a sweet sophomore gifting the entire graduating senior class
translation.ko: 그때 2학년 후배들은 졸업반 선배들에게 주는 선물로

translation.en: their own personalized box of candy.
Yes, you almost didn't get one. My parents made me include you.
translation.ko: 원래 넌 안 주려고 했어 부모님이 주라고 하셔서 너까지 준 거지

translation.en: It's kind of embarrassing. I've never had a…
I don't know how a cocoa bomb works.
translation.ko: 난 코코아 폭탄을 어떻게 먹는지 몰라

translation.en: Oh, well, I'll show you.
You take this, you put it right in there.
And then you add some hot milk.
Watch this.
See, that explodes, and there are all the marshmallows.
Oh, that's cool!
-Try it. -Oh. Thank you.
That's amazing.
You made all those? That's incredible. Oh, it's not that hard. I can teach you.
translation.ko: - 다 네가 만들었어? 대단하네 - 별로 안 힘들어, 가르쳐 줄게

translation.en: [clears throat] Well, that is the last one.
Think we're all set for tomorrow.
translation.ko: 이제 내일 행사 준비는 다 된 것 같아

translation.en: Okay, well, I have some financials to do, so…
translation.ko: 나는 재정 업무를 좀 봐야 해서…

translation.en: I'll lock up, you guys can take off.
translation.ko: 내가 문 닫을 테니 너희는 가서 쉬어

translation.en: Okay. Don't work too late. We have a big day tomorrow.
translation.ko: 그래, 너무 늦게까지 일하지는 마 내일은 중요한 날이니까

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
I'll go get my coat and my things.
I haven't seen you smile like this since I don't know when.
translation.ko: 네가 그렇게 웃는 게 얼마 만인지 모르겠다

translation.en: After my divorce, I just focused on raising Megan and running the shop.
translation.ko: 이혼한 후로는 메건 키우고 가게 운영하느라 바빴지

translation.en: I didn't want another failed relationship.
translation.ko: 인간관계 때문에 또 좌절하고 싶진 않았어

translation.en: Maybe you didn't fail. Maybe the marriage failed you.
translation.ko: 네 잘못이 아니라 그 결혼이 잘못이었을 수도 있어

translation.en: Maybe.
I'm happy for you.
Everyone deserves a second chance.
translation.ko: 누구에게나 두 번째 기회는 필요한 법이야

translation.en: Especially when it comes to love.
Jake. What time is it there?
And what are you eating?
I was hungry for a midnight snack. It's almost one a.m. I couldn't sleep.
translation.ko: 지금 새벽 1시인데 잠은 안 오고 야식이 당기더라고

translation.en: Beans on toast.
Funny with the beans.
So… you all set for Winterfest tomorrow?
Yes. The candy is all made
and Brooks is going to meet me early and help me set up the booth.
translation.ko: 브룩스랑 아침 일찍 만나서 부스 설치하기로 했어

translation.en: Yeah, he mentioned that to me when I spoke to him earlier. You talked to him?
translation.ko: - 저번에 얘기했을 때 말하더라 - 그 사람이랑 얘기했었어?

translation.en: Don't worry, he's going to turn down Erin's business proposal.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마 에린이 제안한 자리는 거절할 거야

translation.en: Wait, what business proposal?
I thought he told you.
Apparently not.
You care to fill me in?
Jake?
I'm waiting.
Here you go. Happy Winterfest.
I'm feeling a little thirsty. Would you like a hot cider?
translation.ko: 목이 좀 마르네 따뜻한 사과주 마실래?

translation.en: -I'd love one. -Okay.
I'll be right back.
-Hey. -Hey.
There you go. What's going on with Kerrie?
What do you mean?
Is she okay?
Oh, she's probably just stressed.
translation.ko: 스트레스를 많이 받았나 봐요 우리 가게 결전의 날이니까요

translation.en: This is the biggest day of the year for the shop.
translation.ko: 스트레스를 많이 받았나 봐요 우리 가게 결전의 날이니까요 그래요, 그런데 어디 간 거죠?

translation.en: Right. Where did she go?
To get us a couple of hot ciders.
Oh. Do you want one?
No, thanks. One is plenty for me.
Oh, right, okay.
Two ciders, please.
-Hey. -Hey.
translation.ko: - 사과주 두 잔 주세요 - 케리 안녕?

translation.en: -Busy day, huh? -Oh, yeah, very busy.
You're not upset with me?
No, I just have to get back to the booth. Can we talk later? Great.
translation.ko: 안 났어, 난 부스로 가 봐야 하니 이따 얘기해도 될까? 고마워

translation.en: Hey, you.
Oh, hey, Erin. Hi.
I had a fun time the other night.
It was fun, yeah, connecting with old friends.
Not that you're old. That's not what I meant.
translation.ko: 네가 옛날 사람이라는 건 아니고 - 그런 뜻은 아니었어 - 무슨 말인지 알아

translation.en: I do. I know what you mean.
translation.ko: - 그런 뜻은 아니었어 - 무슨 말인지 알아

translation.en: Not to sound cliché, but it's true, you know what they say.
translation.ko: 진부하게 들리겠지만 사실이야 그런 말도 있잖아 '구관이 명관이다'

translation.en: Old friends are the best.
Absolutely. Yeah.
So, not to pressure you, but I need to know.
translation.ko: 저기, 부담 주고 싶지는 않지만 답을 들어야겠어

translation.en: There you go.
What's going on with you two?
translation.ko: 너희 두 사람 무슨 일 있어?

translation.en: Nothing. What do you mean?
Yesterday it was all fireworks, today it's like the ice age.
translation.ko: 어제는 불꽃이 튀더니 오늘은 찬바람이 쌩쌩 불잖아

translation.en: Oh, hi, Eileen, how are you? I have your order.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 아일린? 주문하신 거 준비해 뒀어요

translation.en: I am fantastic and enjoying this wonderful festival.
translation.ko: 저는 너무나 안녕해요 오늘 축제도 재밌게 즐기고 있고요

translation.en: -How are you? -Oh, great.
Winterfest is the best time of year.
Are you all right, dear?
Yes. It's just been a tumultuous month, and once again, things aren't certain.
translation.ko: 네, 그냥 한 달간 정신이 없었고 또 헷갈리는 부분이 좀 있어서요

translation.en: [Eileen] Nothing in life ever is.
But I do believe that what's meant to be will always find a way.
The client is really interested in meeting you,
translation.ko: 의뢰인이 널 정말 만나고 싶어 해 게다가 살짝 말해 주자면

translation.en: and between you and me, you are a shoo-in for the COO position.
translation.ko: 게다가 살짝 말해 주자면 너만큼 COO에 적합한 인재는 세상에 또 없어

translation.en: It would be a huge step up in the corporate world.
translation.ko: 사업계에서 크게 발돋움할 수 있을 거야

translation.en: But I need to know either way.
I can't tell you how much I appreciate this offer,
translation.ko: 나한테 제안해 준 건 정말 너무나 고마운데

translation.en: but, even though I might regret this in the future,
translation.ko: 비록 지금 이 결정을 나중에 후회하는 한이 있어도

translation.en: I'm going to turn down the opportunity.
I'm very committed to this little shop.
translation.ko: 난 이 가게에 모든 걸 쏟고 있어

translation.en: I understand.
You know where to find me if you change your mind.
Oh. Sorry. A little something in my throat.
One second, I have your order.
Megan!
-Surprise! -Oh, my goodness!
You're supposed to be in Europe! What are you doing here?
translation.ko: 유럽에 있어야 할 애가 여긴 어떻게 왔어? 엄마 이메일 받고 깜짝 놀라게 해 주고 싶었어

translation.en: [Megan] I got your email and I wanted to surprise you!
translation.ko: 엄마 이메일 받고 깜짝 놀라게 해 주고 싶었어

translation.en: -Uncle Jake helped me with the ticket. -That was so nice of him.
translation.ko: - 표는 제이크 삼촌이 구해 줬어 - 정말 고맙네

translation.en: -I have to fly back on Monday, but-- -I'm so happy you're here!
translation.ko: - 월요일에 돌아가야 하지만… - 괜찮아, 네가 와서 너무 기뻐

translation.en: Megan, this is Brooks, my business partner.
translation.ko: 메건, 이분은 엄마의 사업 파트너 브룩스라고 해

translation.en: -Brooks, this is my daughter Megan. -I've heard so much about you.
translation.ko: - 브룩스, 내 딸 메건이야 - 안녕? - 엄마에게 얘기 많이 들었어 - 저도요

translation.en: Yeah, same here.
I've missed this.
I haven't been home for Winterfest in years.
translation.ko: 윈터페스트 때 집에 있었던 게 벌써 몇 년 전이잖아

translation.en: Well, that is the nice thing about traditions.
You can always come back to them.
But I do worry about you,
especially with Uncle Jake and Ophelia and me so far away.
translation.ko: 특히 지금은 제이크 삼촌도 오필리아 숙모도 나도 멀리 있으니까

translation.en: I'll be fine, I'll figure it out.
translation.ko: 엄마는 괜찮아, 알아서 할 수 있어

translation.en: Aren't you always telling me
translation.ko: 인간관계에서 가장 중요한 건 소통이라고 가르치신 분이

translation.en: communication is the most important thing in any relationship?
translation.ko: 인간관계에서 가장 중요한 건 소통이라고 가르치신 분이 바로 엄마 아니었어?

translation.en: Well… things are a little more complicated with good old Brooks.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 옛날 친구 브룩스랑은 사정이 좀 복잡하거든

translation.en: Only if you let it be.
When did you get so smart? I get it from my mom. [chuckles]
translation.ko: - 너 언제 그렇게 똑똑해졌니? - 엄마 닮아서 그래

translation.en: I see a couple friends I want to say hi to.
Oh, okay. And here's our raffle ticket. Let me know if we win anything.
translation.ko: 그래, 그리고 여기 경품 복권이야 뭔가 당첨되면 알려줘

translation.en: -You got it. -Love you.
[Megan] Love you.
Hi. Hope I didn't interrupt.
No, she just wanted to say hi to some friends.
Um, I'm told that it's a tradition here at Winterfest for partners to dance.
translation.ko: 전통적으로 윈터페스트에서는 파트너랑 춤을 춘다고 하던데

translation.en: Would you dance with me?
If you don't tell me what the problem is, I don't know how to fix it.
translation.ko: 뭐가 문제인지 말해 주지 않으면 나도 고칠 수 없어

translation.en: I just had my whole life turned upside down.
So if you and the pretty headhunter are going to leave me in the lurch,
translation.ko: 그러니까 네가 예쁜 헤드헌터에게로 가서 나를 저버릴 생각이라면 빨리 말해 주길 바라

translation.en: I'd rather know sooner than later.
translation.ko: 나를 저버릴 생각이라면 빨리 말해 주길 바라

translation.en: I knew it.
No, wait. Let me explain.
translation.ko: - 그럴 줄 알았어 - 아니, 잠깐만 내 말 들어 봐

translation.en: You asked why I bought Jake out.
translation.ko: 왜 제이크에게 지분을 샀냐고 물은 적 있지?

translation.en: And I just didn't tell you everything.
When I was in New York, I was engaged.
And the relationship wasn't perfect, but I was dedicated to it,
translation.ko: 완벽한 관계는 아니었지만 열심히 최선을 다했지

translation.en: until I discovered that the woman that I was with,
she wasn't the woman that she said she was at all.
It was just…
it was utterly humiliating
to know that the person I trusted most in the world, she…
she betrayed me, in more ways than one.
And then the fallout, professionally and personally, it just…
translation.ko: 그러면서 내 일도 사생활도 무너져 내렸고

translation.en: Brooks, I am so sorry. I had no idea.
translation.ko: 브룩스, 정말 유감이야 난 전혀 몰랐어

translation.en: So that's why you left New York.
I just started re-evaluating my life, my career choices,
translation.ko: 내 인생, 직업관 등등 모두를 다시 생각하게 되더라

translation.en: just everything.
And I decided that I wanted to make a clean break from that world.
translation.ko: 그 세상을 완전히 떠나서 새로 시작하기로 했지

translation.en: That's right when your brother called me.
What about this new business opportunity with Erin?
I said no. I don't want to go back into that world.
translation.ko: 거절했어 다시 그 세계로 돌아가고 싶지 않아

translation.en: Are you sure this is what you want? Yep.
That chapter of my life is closed.
It's finished.
And I'm very excited to be writing this new chapter with you, together.
translation.ko: 너와 함께 만들어 갈 새 세상이 너무나 기대될 뿐이야

translation.en: Thanks.
Oh. Adam, hi!
I didn't see you earlier. Oh, let me find your order.
translation.ko: 아까는 안 보이던데 주문한 거 찾아 줄게요

translation.en: I finally managed to escape the restaurant.
No. It's for you.
As are these.
They're beautiful.
My favorites, how did you know?
translation.ko: 내가 제일 좋아하는 건데 어떻게 알았어요?

translation.en: I was hoping we could have dinner this week?
translation.ko: 혹시 이번 주에 같이 저녁 먹을래요?

translation.en: It'll be nice letting someone else cook for once.
translation.ko: 한 번쯤은 남이 해 준 요리도 좋을 것 같아서요

translation.en: I'd like that a lot.
Well, I gotta get back to the Eatery.
translation.ko: 그래요, 전 식당으로 다시 가 봐야 해서요

translation.en: I'm not complaining about being busy, but…
I understand. Thanks again for these.
You're welcome.
Hi. Sorry.
I…
I think we should probably get back to the booth.
translation.ko: 우리 다시 부스로 가 봐야 하지 않을까?

translation.en: Sure.
-How's it going? -Oh, good. Better than ever.
-We thought you could use a break. -Thanks.
Do we have more chocolate peanut butter fudge? We're out.
translation.ko: 우리 초콜릿 땅콩버터 퍼지 있어? 다 떨어졌더라고

translation.en: Yes. I made a extra batch this morning. It's at the shop.
translation.ko: 응, 아침에 잔뜩 만들었는데 가게에 두고 왔어

translation.en: -I'll get it. I'll be right back. -[Kerrie] Thank you.
You two looked pretty cozy out on the dance floor.
translation.ko: 두 사람 댄스 플로어에서 꽤 가까워 보이던데

translation.en: Oh, it's a Winterfest tradition.
Business partners have to dance at least one dance together.
translation.ko: 사업 파트너라면 적어도 한 번은 같이 춤춰야 해

translation.en: These are some nice flowers. Where did they come from?
David, give these to your grandmother. They are her favorite.
translation.ko: 이거 할머니 드리세요 가장 좋아하시는 거예요

translation.en: -Thanks. -Kerrie!
-Oh, Tim! -Do you have a minute?
translation.ko: - 케리 - 어머, 팀 - 잠깐 괜찮으세요? - 그럼요

translation.en: -Sure. -I've been meaning to call.
translation.ko: - 잠깐 괜찮으세요? - 그럼요 안 그래도 연락드리려고 했는데 서류를 살펴보니까

translation.en: I did a little digging and the paperwork was signed.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 연락드리려고 했는데 서류를 살펴보니까 서명이 되어 있더라고요 처리가 안 됐을 뿐이었죠

translation.en: It was just filed incorrectly.
translation.ko: 서명이 되어 있더라고요 처리가 안 됐을 뿐이었죠

translation.en: So, your loan has been approved. Congratulations!
Now you can buy out your obnoxious, controlling egoist of a business partner.
translation.ko: 이제 재수 없고 강압적이고 자기중심적인 사업 파트너를 내보내실 수 있겠네요

translation.en: You're free.
Congratulations.
I acted impulsively because I was upset about something.
translation.ko: 그땐 제가 감정이 좀 상해서 충동적으로 행동했어요

translation.en: I'm sorry, Tim, but I'm not gonna need that loan.
translation.ko: 팀, 죄송하지만 대출은 필요 없을 것 같아요

translation.en: Things with my new business partner are better than I could have dreamed.
translation.ko: 사업 파트너와의 관계는 상상 이상으로 너무 좋거든요

translation.en: -Again, I'm sorry for the inconvenience. -No worries.
I'm glad to hear it.
Come by the booth for some peanut chocolate butter fudge.
translation.ko: 저희 부스로 오실래요? 땅콩버터 초콜릿 공짜로 드릴게요

translation.en: I'll gladly take you up on that.
Hey, Erin, it's Brooks. Hey, I had a bit of a change of heart.
translation.ko: 에린, 나 브룩스인데 마음이 조금 바뀌었어

translation.en: I'm wondering if you could set up that interview for me.
translation.ko: 면접 일정 잡아 줄 수 있을까?

translation.en: Call me back, let me know. Thank you.
[Megan] Mom! You won!
-What? I never win anything. -Well, you did this time.
translation.ko: 뭐라고? 난 당첨되는 법이 없는데 이번엔 당첨됐어

translation.en: Open it!
Are you kidding?
Seriously?
It's meant to be.
A couple friends are getting together at Izzy's house.
translation.ko: 친구들 몇 명이 이지네서 모인다고 하는데

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Go, have a good time.
-Love you. -Love you too.
-See ya, Alexandra. -See ya, honey.
Did Brooks say when he would be coming back?
translation.ko: 혹시 브룩스가 언제 오겠다고 말하고 갔어?

translation.en: He didn't. Just said he had some calls to return.
-Hi. Here's your coffee. -Oh, thanks.
translation.ko: - 안녕? 네 커피 사 왔어 - 고마워

translation.en: Have you seen Brooks?
I looked for him after Winterfest last night
and he hasn't returned my messages. It's not like him.
translation.ko: 메시지에 답도 안 하더라 브룩스답지 않아

translation.en: I haven't seen him since he dropped off the fudge at the booth.
translation.ko: 퍼지 가져다준 후로는 나도 못 봤어

translation.en: You know what… I'm starting to worry.
Maybe he just lost his phone.
Yeah. Well, whatever. I hope he's okay.
Still no response.
What's so urgent that you had to interrupt bingo?
translation.ko: 뭐가 그렇게 급하길래 빙고 중간에 불러내니?

translation.en: I was winning.
Do you remember that big offer I told you about?
translation.ko: 제가 전에 이직 제안 받았다고 얘기했잖아요

translation.en: -The one you can't turn down? -Yeah, that's the one.
translation.ko: 거절할 수 없는 제안이라고 했던 거? 네, 그거요

translation.en: And the main campus is in California, so get your surfboard ready.
translation.ko: 본사가 캘리포니아에 있대요 그러니까 서프보드 준비하세요

translation.en: I thought things were going pretty well?
translation.ko: 난 지금 일도 잘되고 있는 줄 알았는데

translation.en: You and Kerrie seemed to be hitting it off.
translation.ko: 너랑 케리도 잘 맞는 것 같았고

translation.en: Am I wrong?
No. No, I was.
I thought you wanted to move to the Golden State?
I kinda like living in the Buckeye State.
What happened?
I don't know, Dad.
Just wrong about a woman again.
Anyway, listen, if you want to stay here,
there's offices in Cincinnati that I can work out of.
I'll make sure everything's taken care of.
translation.ko: 어느 쪽이든 원하시는 대로 맞출 수 있어요

translation.en: No, I go where you go.
I've had a great life.
Your happiness is what matters to me.
Thanks. I love you, Dad.
You don't look very happy.
As a matter of fact, you look downright miserable.
You wanna talk about it? No, not really. No.
You've got to remember that Kerrie isn't Sierra.
I gotta go to Cincinnati, sign these papers. I'll be back in a few hours.
translation.ko: 전 계약하러 신시내티로 가야 해요 몇 시간 걸릴 거예요

translation.en: Let me know, I'll be ready to go.
translation.ko: 난 갈 준비 됐으니 언제든 말하렴

translation.en: Jake, hey. So, how was Winterfest?
We nearly doubled what we made last year.
I told you Brooks was a financial genius.
And, how are things going with him?
Good, great. We sorted out the job thing and now everything's perfect.
translation.ko: 좋아, 운영 문제도 잘 타협했고 지금은 아무 문제 없어

translation.en: I had a feeling you two would hit it off.
translation.ko: 두 사람은 잘 통할 것 같았어

translation.en: Yeah. I just don't know where he is right now.
translation.ko: 응, 그런데 지금 어디 있는지 모르겠어

translation.en: -Any sign of Brooks? -No.
translation.ko: 브룩스 소식 없어? 응, 이렇게까지 늦는 건 처음이네

translation.en: He's never been this late before.
Okay, that's it.
Something is not right.
Where are you going?
Well, I'll tell you where I'm going.
I am going to break out of my fortress and get some answers,
translation.ko: 어떤 답이 나오든 상관없으니 답을 알고 싶어서

translation.en: no matter what they might be, that's where I'm going.
translation.ko: 내 안의 장벽을 부수러 가 - 그거 하러 간다 - 파이팅

translation.en: Yes, girl.
Papa Joel.
Kerrie! What a nice surprise. What brings you here?
I thought everyone might need a break from all that candy.
translation.ko: 매일 사탕에만 매달리면 안 될 것 같아서요

translation.en: Is Brooks here?
No. Sorry.
-Papa Joel, do you have a minute? -For you, absolutely.
translation.ko: - 저랑 잠깐 이야기하실래요? - 케리라면 언제든 환영이죠

translation.en: -Sit down. -Thank you.
translation.ko: - 저랑 잠깐 이야기하실래요? - 케리라면 언제든 환영이죠 감사합니다

translation.en: I'm gonna miss these snowy winter days.
translation.ko: 이제 눈 오는 겨울 날씨가 그리울 거예요

translation.en: Not to worry, you still have a few more months of snowy weather.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마세요 아직 몇 달 정도는 눈이 더 올 테니까요

translation.en: Not where I'm moving.
You're moving?!
Yeah, didn't Brooks mention anything to you?
translation.ko: 네, 브룩스가 아무 말 안 했어요?

translation.en: No, he did not.
Well, I don't think it's my place to…
translation.ko: 글쎄요, 내가 할 말은 아닌 것 같은데…

translation.en: He's in Cincinnati at a business meeting,
translation.ko: 브룩스는 사업 면담이 있어서 신시내티에 갔어요

translation.en: and if all goes well, we'll be relocating to California.
translation.ko: 얘기가 잘 풀린다면 우린 캘리포니아로 갈 것 같아요

translation.en: By the sounds of it, pretty soon too.
translation.ko: 얘기를 들어 보니 금방 옮길 것 같더군요

translation.en: I don't understand.
Look, I don't know what happened between you two,
translation.ko: 저기, 두 사람 사이에 무슨 일이 있었는지는 모르지만

translation.en: but there's one thing I do know…
translation.ko: 이거 하나는 나도 알아요 케리가 내 나이가 되면

translation.en: when you get to my age, you won't regret the chances you took for love,
translation.ko: 이거 하나는 나도 알아요 케리가 내 나이가 되면 사랑을 위해 결정한 일을 후회하진 않을 거예요

translation.en: only the ones you let pass you by.
Do you know when he'll be back?
-Late afternoon. -Thank you.
Oh, and… please don't tell him we talked.
translation.ko: 그리고… 저랑 얘기한 건 비밀로 해 주세요

translation.en: I won't.
Kerrie.
I want you to know…
I'm rooting for you.
Me too.
The only thing that's missing from this is your signature.
If you don't like the California campus, you can always work from here.
translation.ko: 캘리포니아 본사가 싫으면 신시내티로 돌아와도 돼

translation.en: No, no. My dad's stoked for the sun and surf.
I don't blame him.
-You're lucky to have him. -I am.
I've worked so hard my whole life, sacrificed everything to be successful.
translation.ko: 난 평생 열심히 일했어 성공하기 위해 거의 모든 걸 포기했지

translation.en: I think you and I are two of a kind.
translation.ko: 너랑 나는 똑 닮은 것 같아

translation.en: These are from a client. Have one.
translation.ko: 의뢰인 쪽에서 준 거야 하나 먹어 봐

translation.en: Thank you.
What should I do with this? Regift it?
translation.ko: 이건 어떻게 할까? 다시 사은품으로 내놓을까?

translation.en: It's starting to grow on me. [chuckles]
-[phone buzzing] -Oh, excuse me.
Murphy Candy & Gifts.
Hi.
How did you find me?
-Papa Joel. -Oh, yeah. Should have guessed.
-Can we talk? -No, I don't think so.
translation.ko: - 얘기 좀 할까? - 안 그러는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: I'm so sorry that this didn't work out, but…
translation.ko: 우리 일이 잘 안 풀려서 유감이긴 하지만…

translation.en: I will sign any papers that you have.
translation.ko: 내 서명이 필요하다면 어디에든 서명해 줄게

translation.en: Brooks, what are you talking about?
I'm talking about the loan documents.
Unfortunately for you, I overheard you talking to the bank manager.
translation.ko: 언짢겠지만 네가 은행 사람이랑 이야기하는 걸 들었거든

translation.en: So, please, don't worry. I'm not going to cause any problems.
translation.ko: 그러니까 걱정하지 마 시끄러운 일 안 만들게

translation.en: Brooks, is that what you thought?
That I would confront you about leaving me in the lurch
and go behind your back and get a secret loan to buy you out of the business?
translation.ko: 뒤로는 너 몰래 대출을 받아서 네 지분을 뺏을 거라고?

translation.en: I told Tim I don't want the loan.
I had him cancel it.
Yes, at first I did want it, but…
that was before I got to know you.
I had the contract in my hand…
and I couldn't sign it.
-You didn't sign it? -No.
Why not?
translation.ko: 왜? 난 평생 마음이 너무 불안해서

translation.en: It's because this restlessness that has driven me my whole life
translation.ko: 난 평생 마음이 너무 불안해서 계속 여기저기로 옮겨 다니며 살았는데

translation.en: from place to place…
it's not here anymore.
It's gone.
Since I met you.
I guess I'm changing.
Well… "Life is for the living, but…
he who's living must be prepared for changes."
translation.ko: '산 자는 변화를 각오해야 한다'는 말도 있잖아

translation.en: Is that my high-school yearbook quote?
translation.ko: 내가 졸업 앨범에 남긴 말 아니야?

translation.en: What about you? Why didn't you take the loan?
translation.ko: 너는? 너는 왜 대출 안 받았어? 왜 마음을 바꾸었어?

translation.en: What changed your mind?
translation.ko: 너는 왜 대출 안 받았어? 왜 마음을 바꾸었어?

translation.en: Well, I might have fallen in love with you.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 어쩌면 내가 널 사랑하는지도 모르겠어

translation.en: You might have?
I have fallen in love with you.
And it's wonderful and terrifying because you know how I feel about change.
translation.ko: 정말 멋지면서도 두려운 일이야 내가 변화를 어떻게 생각하는지 너도 알잖아

translation.en: But I had to come and tell you.
translation.ko: 하지만 꼭 널 만나서 이야기하고 싶었어

translation.en: And honestly, if you don't feel the same way, it's…
-I like it. -Me too.
I got something for you.
-What? -It's a surprise.
-[gasps] Two tickets to Belgium?! -That's right.
We're going back to the very little village
translation.ko: 네 증조부모님이 사탕 만드는 법을 배우신

translation.en: that your great grandparents learned to make candy.
Then we're going to see Jake and Ophelia and, of course, Megan.
translation.ko: 거기서 제이크와 오필리아도 보고 메건도 만나자

translation.en: I love you, Brooks McLead.
-I love you too, Bean. -[giggles]
